newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Marsh Supermarkets cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Marsh Supermarkets cut.

text.p: -- Hilliard Lyons analyst Jeffrey Thomison said Tuesday he had cut his rating on Marsh Supermarkets Inc to hold from buy due to diminished expectations.
-- He recommends holding Marsh shares, citing potential earnings rebounds in the remainder of fiscal 1996.
-- Shares are fairly valued relative to his expected long-term earnings growth rate of 10 percent annually, he said.
-- Marsh class B shares were down 7/16 at 10-1/4. Marsh class A shares closed on Monday at 11-7/8.
